name: stream-ai-forecasting-system
description: AI-powered flood forecasting system with weather monitoring

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.docker:deploy: docker-compose -f Database/docker-compose.dev.yml down && docker-compose -f Database/docker-compose.dev.yml up --build -d
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run docker:up && cd server && npx prisma generate && npx prisma migrate dev
